newsitem.title: USA: Pacific Exchange to list two new options on June 5.
newsitem.headline: Pacific Exchange to list two new options on June 5.

text.p: The Pacific Exchange (PCX) said it will begin trading options on shares of Transaction Network Services Inc and Walker Interactive Systems Inc on June 5.
The exchange said both Transaction Network and Walker Interactive options will have opening strike prices of 12-1/2, 15 and 17-1/2 and initial expirations in June, July, September and December.
Position limits of 4,500 contracts have been set for each.

Transaction Network options have been allocated to lead market makers Jeff Jones and Jeff Ng. Walker Interactive options have been allocated to lead market makers Ron Goodman and Mark Weinstock, the exchange said.
